analytics_info: Example: "UA-XXXXX-Y" for Google Analytics or "xxxxxxx" for XiTi. Declare "http://mon_instance.univ-lyon1.fr/icap_website/id" as a site in Google Analytics.
change_bg_image_attention_text: Warning! If you change this option, the current option (image) will be deleted.
confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "%title%" and all its children?
css_code: Apply CSS rules to website content
description_limit_message: Maximum 160 characters. Capitalize the first letter of an important word or even the whole word.
empty_site_message: Your website is currently empty. You need to create some pages. The first page you create will be set as homepage. You can change this option anytime by clicking "Set as homepage" inside the edit panel of the currently selected page.
error_401: You don't have sufficient permissions to perform this action.
error_417: The action failed because a required parameter was missing or invalid.
error_500: Your action has not been processed because of a server's internal error. If the error persists, please contact our support team.
error_511: This action needs authentication. If you were authenticated before, your session has timed out. Please log in and try again.
rich_content_explain: Add rich content by showing the editor inside the object.
section_info: Has a different style in menu
success_message: Your request has been processed successfully.
title: Title
title_limit_message: Less than 70 characters, as this is the limit Google displays in search results.
visible: Make this page visible on the site
